name: Tack Battle Beta
description:
Tack - the open world shooter.

Tack is a new open world shooter with a vast explorable world, with enemies to fight, hoards to kill, weapons to collect and a massive city, desert, and forest to explore as many times as you like.

Features:
Vast open world to explore
Many zombies, enemies and soldiers to kill
Loads of open space to practice shooting and aim


This is the beta version, the list and description below may change.
